scripts.dev:chain:docker: docker compose run --service-ports --rm anchor anchor localnet
scripts.anchor:docker:build: docker compose run --rm anchor bash -lc "anchor build -p ${PROGRAM:-timemarket}"
scripts.anchor:docker:deploy: docker compose run --rm anchor bash -lc "anchor build -p ${PROGRAM:-timemarket} && anchor deploy -p ${PROGRAM:-timemarket}"
scripts.anchor:docker:deploy-only: docker compose run --rm anchor bash -lc "anchor deploy -p ${PROGRAM:-timemarket}"
scripts.anchor:docker:keys:sync: docker compose run --rm anchor bash -lc "anchor keys sync -p ${PROGRAM:-timemarket}"
scripts.anchor:wsldeploy: bash -lc 'export CARGO_TARGET_DIR=docker-target && anchor build -p ${PROGRAM:-timemarket} && anchor deploy -p ${PROGRAM:-timemarket}'
scripts.test:report: pnpm -s test && echo 'Reports available under reports/'
